entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 6. POP 40%
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending early this evening then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light late this evening. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 10 March 2023
